short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance the Letterboxd review editor with additional HTML formatting options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily integrate HTML elements in your movie reviews with this Extension! The Letterboxd Editor Enhancer offers seamless integration with the Letterboxd review editor, empowering users with a suite of formatting options right at their fingertips. Easily italicize, bold, add anchor links, and even quote text with a click, all within Letterboxd's interface. Elevate your review-writing game and make your movie thoughts stand out with our intuitive and user-friendly extension.

Credit to woKaa for the original idea and inspiration behind this extension.
